response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,000,000 by you. However, considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a substantial saving of $50,000 compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
